summary: Embeddings must be lazy-loaded and fall back gracefully to keyword search if ONNX/transformers fails
context: Semantic search is valuable but ONNX runtime can fail on some platforms. Server must never fail to start.
rationale: Key constraint: embedding system is enhancement, not requirement. Lazy loading defers heavy init. Fallback to keyword search (substring matching) ensures all query tools work regardless.
constraints: Server startup must never fail due to embedding issues
Must work on platforms where ONNX is unavailable
